description: Try our easy to follow Braised Lamb Shank Stew recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Braised Lamb Shank Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: mashed potato, steamed green beans and finely chopped continental parsley, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Place dish over medium-high heat. Bring pan juices to the boil. Boil, uncovered, stirring occasionally, for 7 minutes or until slightly thickened. Season. Remove and discard bay leaves and thyme. Serve shanks with mashed potato and beans, drizzle over sauce and scatter over parsley.
